comments.en:
Toner Black (4500 prints)
Toner Yellow (4500 prints)
Toner Magenta (4500 prints)
Toner Cyan (4500 prints)
Waste Toner Box (25000 prints)
OPC Drum Cartridge (45000 prints)

The magicolor 2300 DL is a cheap network color laser printer which works with the free driver which Konica Minolta supplies for the magicolor 2430 DL.

Note that the older Minolta magicolor 2300 DL and the newer Konica Minolta magicolor 2300 DL are not 100% equal. So it is not sure whether the Minolta magicolor 2300 DL perhaps also works with the driver from Konica Minolta.
